Hero.title: The Future <green>Grows</green> in the Ground
Hero.subtitle: From Nile Valley farms to desert reclamation projects — our seeds power the future of sustainable agriculture.

About.title: About <green>Us</green>
About.description: Born from Egypt's deep agricultural legacy, we in Shahbandar carry forward the spirit of the Nile and the wisdom of generations of farmers. Since our founding, we've dedicated ourselves to supporting the country's farming communities with high-quality seeds tailored to Egypt's diverse climates. Our vision is to support Egyptian agriculture by providing trusted, high-quality seeds that help farmers — from smallholders to large-scale producers — grow stronger harvests and more resilient crops.

1.text: To have our products spread across all of Egypt, achieving the best reputation for our brand, Shahbandar.

2.text: To expand our exports throughout the Arab world and African countries.

3.text: To continuously develop our products and add new ones that serve the market at least every two years.

4.text: To expand the use of the latest market research methods to improve our services and products.

5.text: To support agricultural expansion in Egypt’s new lands with products that suit the nature and requirements of these areas.

1.title: Commitment
1.text: to high-quality specifications in the production of planting seeds

2.title: Adherence
2.text: to the highest standards of scientific research to develop our products.

3.title: Support
3.text: provided to traders, companies and farmers through the guidance of our engineers and technical experts.

4.title: Reaching
4.text: all our customers in Egypt, along with the Arab and African markets.

5.title: Working
5.text: according to the policy that The customer is the core of our business, and protecting our brand by respecting our customers.

1.title: Production
1.text: The Production Department in the company is responsible for cultivating foundation seeds at our major research farm in the Farafra region of Egypt, or on lands contracted with major companies or large-scale farmers across different parts of Egypt. The department plays a central role, being responsible for the quality and conformity of the seeds produced, ensuring they meet agricultural standards. It is staffed by some of Egypt’s top seed production engineers, who bring extensive experience from global companies, positioning them among the leading seed cultivation experts in the country.

2.title: Research and Development
2.text: In this vital department, seeds are continuously tested to assess their quality and compliance with international standards. The department is also responsible for introducing new varieties that the company will produce exclusively under its name in both local and global markets. It includes some of Egypt's finest agricultural academics, all holding PhDs in agricultural sciences, and possessing deep and extensive practical experience.

3.title: Sales and Marketing
3.text: The mission of the Sales and Marketing Department goes beyond simply selling our products. The department constantly analyzes sales figures, agricultural consumer behavior, and global market trends to offer products tailored to both local and international markets. It includes engineers who are academically, scientifically, and practically qualified, all with vast experience in the local market and strong expertise in both agriculture and marketing.

4.title: Silos and Warehouses
4.text: Our company is a pioneer in the seed production industry, being the first to own grain and seed silos to facilitate the production process and optimally preserve seeds scientifically, practically, and hygienically throughout the year. Our storage capacity reaches up to three thousand tons. We also have several qualified and Ministry-of-Agriculture-certified warehouses for storing the final product before distribution. These warehouses are secure and designed to facilitate distribution across Egypt and to meet global seed export standards.

5.title: Refrigeration
5.text: Our company has sufficient cooling spaces to ensure the proper preservation of seeds and grains during hot weather. This guarantees the optimal condition and superior qualities of the final product for high productivity. The refrigeration units are located at our main center in Aswan Governorate, southern Egypt.

6.title: Administration
6.text: Our administrative unit is primarily responsible for organizing client transactions, ensuring the product reaches the final customer smoothly and efficiently. It also guarantees accurate accounting and excellent administrative performance, reflecting our core value that the customer is at the heart of our work. The department includes branches for accounting, human resources, logistics, and secretarial services.

Clients.title: Our <green>Clients</green>
Clients.description: We are proud to serve a diverse range of clients, including farmers, agricultural companies, distributors, government agencies and exporters.

Contact.title: Contact <green>Us</green>
Contact.description: For inquiries, please reach out to us at:

brief.p1: Shahbandar Company was established in 1995 as a commercial company in the field of agricultural production, particularly grains and crops. As the company expanded its operations across the republic, it became necessary for us to evolve. Thus, in 2004, Shahbandar entered the field of seed and crop production.
brief.p2: Development is a constant approach for us, which is why we established a Research and Development department to serve as a core pillar of Shahbandar Company. This department has made a significant contribution to the Shahbandar brand.
brief.p3: Over time, the company has developed itself and now has many commercial varieties. Among the most important maize varieties, for example: the Single Hybrid 167, which is one of the Ministry of Agriculture’s most important varieties and is now exclusively owned by the company. Also, the second exclusive variety from the Ministry to Shahbandar is the Triple Hybrid 353. In addition, the company also offers other maize seed varieties from the Ministry such as 168, 368, 321, and other well-known varieties.
brief.p4: As for wheat varieties, the company produces all strains developed by the Ministry of Agriculture. It produces more than ten high-quality varieties. Shahbandar has gained a prominent name and a large market share in the production and marketing of high-yield Egyptian wheat varieties. The company also produces barley, clover, fava beans, soybeans, rice, and other crops.
brief.p5: In the field of scientific research, Shahbandar has a team of researchers specializing in maize and other crop production. We give great importance to practical research for the benefit of Egyptian farmers and to uphold the reputation of Egyptian agricultural products in the global export market. The company also has new varieties under registration with the Ministry of Agriculture. Notably, Shahbandar is the only seed production company in Egypt that owns silos for proper seed storage, as well as a seed storage refrigerator at its headquarters in Aswan.
brief.p6: Regarding the local market, Shahbandar has a presence in all governorates of Egypt and has a network of agents across the country, even in the major centers. Of course, we cannot overlook the large agricultural companies in Egypt, where we also have a strong presence. Most of these major companies trust the Shahbandar name and rely on it for the supply of seed and crop varieties, making Shahbandar seeds among the strongest suppliers to Egypt’s top agricultural companies.
brief.p7: As for the export market, the Shahbandar brand is present in more than eight African countries, including Senegal, Uganda, Algeria, Libya, and Sudan. Shahbandar has developed a strong administrative system and maintains constant oversight to protect the brand from counterfeiting and imitation, in order to safeguard our product and farmers’ trust.
brief.p8: Shahbandar’s production engineers provide full guidance to companies and farmers to ensure greater and better productivity, including the establishment of demonstration fields for farmers.
brief.p9: As for the Marketing and Sales Department, Shahbandar has invested in a strong marketing and sales team to conduct thorough scientific market studies, develop plans for product improvement, introduce new products into Egypt’s crop cultivation map, and support major traders in reaching farmers across Egypt through well-planned, practical, and field-implemented strategies.
